subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored his N.H.L.-leading 55th and 56th goals, and Olaf Kolzig earned his 300th win in the Washington Capitals’ 3-2 victory over the visiting Calgary Flames.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored his N.H.L.-leading 55th and 56th goals, and Olaf Kolzig earned his 300th win in the Washington Capitals’ 3-2 victory over the visiting Calgary Flames.
